Item.Value: [Text:Hmmm, well I suppose you'll do. If you could see fit to arranging a place for us to live, I'd be quite appreciative.][UnlockBuildingID:23][Name:Introduction]
[Text:Hello, $Name$! What brings you into town today?][Default]
[Text:My mother was mayor before me. I'm glad that the townsfolk placed their trust in me to lead them in her footsteps.][Default]
[Text:Oh, hello $Name$, What can I do for you?][Name:ShopOpen]
[Text:Oh? Why, thank you for the kind thought.][Name:Gift]
[Text:I hope the manor isn't leaking too much in all of this rain.][Weather:Raining][Name:Raining|1]
[Text:Oh! This is very thoughtful of you. How did you know I was looking for this? Thank you.][Name:Collection]
